memberdef.name: TMC5240_SPI_STATUS_RESET_FLAG_MASK
memberdef.initializer: 0x01 /* GSTAT[0] - 1: Signals, that a reset has occurred (clear by reading GSTAT) */

memberdef.name: TMC5240_SPI_STATUS_DRIVER_ERROR_MASK
memberdef.initializer: 0x02 /* GSTAT[1] – 1: Signals driver 1 driver error (clear by reading GSTAT) */

memberdef.name: TMC5240_SPI_STATUS_VELOCITY_REACHED_MASK
memberdef.initializer: 0x10 /* RAMP_STAT[8] – 1: Signals target velocity reached (motion controller only) */

memberdef.name: TMC5240_SPI_STATUS_POSITION_REACHED_MASK
memberdef.initializer: 0x20 /* RAMP_STAT[9] – 1: Signals target position reached (motion controller only) */

memberdef.name: TMC5240_SPI_STATUS_STATUS_STOP_L_MASK
memberdef.initializer: 0x40 /* RAMP_STAT[0] – 1: Signals stop left switch status (motion controller only) */

memberdef.name: TMC5240_SPI_STATUS_STATUS_STOP_R_MASK
memberdef.initializer: 0x80 /* RAMP_STAT[1] – 1: Signals stop right switch status (motion controller only) */
